mapper.select: select a.no, a.title, a.contents, a.reg_date, a.hit, a.g_no, a.o_no, a.depth, a.user_no, b.name from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no and a.no=#{no }

choose.when: SELECT a.no, a.title, a.contents, a.hit, a.reg_date, a.g_no, a.o_no, a.depth, b.name, a.user_no FROM board a , user b WHERE a.user_no = b.no AND a.title like #{kwd } ORDER BY g_no desc, o_no asc, depth asc limit #{page }, 5
choose.otherwise: select a.no, a.title, a.contents, a.hit, a.reg_date, a.g_no, a.o_no, a.depth, b.name, a.user_no from board a , user b where a.user_no = b.no AND a.title like #{kwd } order by g_no desc, o_no asc, depth asc limit #{page }, 5

mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM board WHERE title like #{kwd }
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET hit = hit + 1 WHERE no = #{no }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (title, contents, hit, reg_date, g_no, o_no, depth, user_no) select #{title }, #{contents }, 0, now(), ifnull(MAX(g_no) + 1, 1) , 1, 0, #{user_no } from board
